document_data.name: ''Spiderstep boots''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Spiderstep boots''''' were a variety of [[magic]]al boots that could be found on the [[Sword Coast]] of [[Faer√ªn]]. They allowed the wearer to readily step on and over spider webs, without impediment.

{{Quote|I woke to a gift wrapped in [[spidersilk|spider's silk]]: a pair of boots, taken from a heretic's corpse. Lolth sends her daughters to reward my faith, to let me know I am on the right path.|''Anonymous.''}}
document_data.Description: The surface of the boots had a slightly sticky texture.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of these boots was immune from being entangled in webs, whether mundane or magical in nature.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a pair of ''spiderstep boots'' could be found within the [[Whispering Depths]], a cavern network found beneath the village of [[Moonhaven]] on the Sword Coast.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: It was speculated by some that these boots were associated with the [[Lolthite]] faith.
